summary:
This is a replacer for the candle glow texture.
Adds some ambience to the candles by glare effects.
descriptionHtml:
This is a replacer for the candle glow texture.
Adds some ambience to the candles by glare effects.

In ENB settings, [LIGHTSPRITE] values are related to the visibility of this mod.

[heading]Installation[/heading]
Via any mod manager or manually merge into the data folder.
